title: Jason Bateman | Colbert Classic
description:
Netflix's 'Ozark' star Jason Bateman has considered a post-acting venture into late night TV. Stephen makes Jason's dream a premature reality and hands over the reigns to The Late Show in this Colbert Classic from the vault.
